item.title: "Warcraft" delivers so-so fantasy
item.description:
"Warcraft" delivers so-so fantasy

Hollywood is trying to desperately fill the void that the “Lord of The Rings" franchise and the "Harry Potter" series left behind. Legendary Pictures partners with Blizzard Entertainment to bring a fantasy film based on a 1994 video game.

item.title: Keanu Review
item.description:
Keanu Review

It is a bit silly to think that an action film with a kitten in the lead can be any good. ‘Keanu’ proves that at times the underdog, even though it comes in the form of a cat, might offer a surprising, and entertaining time from beginning to end.
